summary: I OWN A 2000 BUICK CENTURY AND HAVE BEEN HAVING PROBLEMS WITH MY WINDSHIELD WIPERS.  THEY SEEM TO HAVE A MIND OF THEIR OWN.  THEY WILL GO AT WHATEVER SPEED THEY WANT.  THEY HAVE PROGRESSIVELY GOTTEN WORSE, AND ARE NOW AT THE POINT WHERE THEY WILL COMPLETELY STOP BUT I CAN STILL HEAR THE MOTOR TRYING TO RUN. I HAVE TRIED TO FIND OUT IF THERE IS A RECALL FOR THIS VEHICLE BUT AM COMING UP BLANK.  I AM SURE THAT I AM NOT THE ONLY PERSON WITH THIS PROBLEM.
